availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel S. Patterson (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, and justice of the peace. Ohio native. Married to Margaret A. Patterson. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860. Merchant in Pendleton County in 1863. Justice of the peace in Pendleton County in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 90; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Pendleton County, KY, June/July 1863, p. 245, (Accessed via ancestry.com); Texas Department of State Health Services, Texas Death Certificates, 1903â€“1982, Certificate# 31123, Texas, Denton County, Denton, March 18, 1834; KYR-0001-007-0320.
